SEARCH
Package controller

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
controller.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientServerHandler, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMILobby
public abstract class Lobby extends Object implements ClientServerHandler
ServerApp is the running program of the server, it handles the remote clients and all the actions each client wants to take

    • login

      public GameHandler login(String nickname, Object client) throws RemoteException, IOException, LoginException
      Method called by the client to log into the server to start a new game.
      Specified by:
      login in interface ClientServerHandler
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • checkAskNumberOfPlayers

      public void checkAskNumberOfPlayers()
      Method to check if the server has to ask a client the number of players he wants in his game. It is always executed immediately after the login() method.

    • checkFullWaitingRoom

      public void checkFullWaitingRoom()
      If the waiting room size is equal to the number of attended players a new Game starts and all the players are notified It is always executed immediately after the checkAskNumberOfPlayers() method.

    • continueGame

    • leaveGame

      public void leaveGame(String nickname, int ID) throws LoginException, RemoteException
      method called by a client to leave the game he is playing. -check if exists GameID=ID -check if exists a player called "nickname" now offline inside Game ID -if the game is suspended or active, the game is finished and all the players are notified -if the game is ended the player is removed from the lobby and if there are less than 2 players the game is finished
      Specified by:
      leaveGame in interface ClientServerHandler
      Throws:
      LoginException
      RemoteException

    • quitGameIDandNotify

      public void quitGameIDandNotify(Game myGame)
      interrupt game "myGame" and tells to all the players that the game is ended, remove each player from "clients" and at the end delete myGame from "games".
      Parameters:
      myGame - : the Game I want to interrupt
